@nocobase/plugin-ai.Frequency penalty description: Number between -2.0 and 2.0. Positive values penalize new tokens based on their existing frequency in the text so far, decreasing the model's likelihood to repeat the same line verbatim.
@nocobase/plugin-ai.Get models list failed, you can enter a: Get models list failed, you can enter a model name manually.
@nocobase/plugin-ai.Max completion tokens description: An upper bound for the number of tokens that can be generated for a completion, including visible output tokens and reasoning tokens.
@nocobase/plugin-ai.Presence penalty description: Number between -2.0 and 2.0. Positive values penalize new tokens based on whether they appear in the text so far, increasing the model's likelihood to talk about new topics.
@nocobase/plugin-ai.Response format description: Important: when using JSON mode, you must also instruct the model to produce JSON yourself via a system or user message.
@nocobase/plugin-ai.Temperature description: What sampling temperature to use, between 0 and 2. Higher values like 0.8 will make the output more random, while lower values like 0.2 will make it more focused and deterministic.
@nocobase/plugin-ai.Top P description: An alternative to sampling with temperature, called nucleus sampling, where the model considers the results of the tokens with top_p probability mass. So 0.1 means only the tokens comprising the top 10% probability mass are considered.

@nocobase/plugin-ai-ee.Frequency penalty description: Number between -2.0 and 2.0. Positive values penalize new tokens based on their existing frequency in the text so far, decreasing the model's likelihood to repeat the same line verbatim.
@nocobase/plugin-ai-ee.Max completion tokens description: An upper bound for the number of tokens that can be generated for a completion, including visible output tokens and reasoning tokens.
@nocobase/plugin-ai-ee.Presence penalty description: Number between -2.0 and 2.0. Positive values penalize new tokens based on whether they appear in the text so far, increasing the model's likelihood to talk about new topics.
@nocobase/plugin-ai-ee.Response format description: Important: when using JSON mode, you must also instruct the model to produce JSON yourself via a system or user message.
@nocobase/plugin-ai-ee.Temperature description: What sampling temperature to use, between 0 and 2. Higher values like 0.8 will make the output more random, while lower values like 0.2 will make it more focused and deterministic.
@nocobase/plugin-ai-ee.Top P description: An alternative to sampling with temperature, called nucleus sampling, where the model considers the results of the tokens with top_p probability mass. So 0.1 means only the tokens comprising the top 10% probability mass are considered.

@nocobase/plugin-password-policy.Clear unlocked users tooltip: Unlocked users usually have lock records cleared upon sign-in, but in some cases expired records may remain. You can manually clear them if needed.
@nocobase/plugin-password-policy.Lockout duration description: Lockout duration (in seconds) after exceeding the maximum invalid sign-in attempts (0 means no lockout). Users are blocked from accessing the application, including via API keys.
@nocobase/plugin-password-policy.Max invalid password sign-in attempts in: Max invalid password sign-in attempts interval (seconds)
@nocobase/plugin-password-policy.Max sign-in attempts description: The maximum number of invalid password sign-in attempts allowed within a specific time frame.
@nocobase/plugin-password-policy.Max sign-in attempts interval descriptio: The interval (in seconds) for counting the invalid password sign-in attempts, with a minimum value of 30 seconds.
@nocobase/plugin-password-policy.Password complexity 3_of_4: Must include 3 of the following: numbers, uppercase letters, lowercase letters, and special characters
@nocobase/plugin-password-policy.Password complexity alpha_numeric: Must include alpha and numeric characters
@nocobase/plugin-password-policy.Password complexity alpha_numeric_specia: Must include alpha, numeric and special characters
@nocobase/plugin-password-policy.Password complexity numbers_upper_lower: Must include numbers and uppercase and lowercase letters
@nocobase/plugin-password-policy.Password complexity numbers_upper_lower_: Must include numbers, uppercase and lowercase letters, and special characters
@nocobase/plugin-password-policy.Password expiration channel description: Notify users at sign in if their password expires within 10 days. You can create notification channels in notification management.
@nocobase/plugin-password-policy.Password history count description: The number of previous passwords stored to prevent reuse.
@nocobase/plugin-password-policy.Password length must be between {{n}} an: Password length must be between {{n}} and 64 characters
@nocobase/plugin-password-policy.Password must be different from the last: Password must be different from the last {{historyCount}} passwords
@nocobase/plugin-password-policy.Password validity period description: After the password expires, the user can't sign in using password until the administrator resets the password. However, the user can still sign in using other configured authentication methods.
@nocobase/plugin-password-policy.Security settings notice lockout: users will be locked for {{ lockoutDuration }} seconds after {{ maxSignInAttempts }} invalid password sign-in attempts within {{ maxSignInAttemptsInterval }} seconds.
@nocobase/plugin-password-policy.Security settings notice no limit: there is not limit on invalid password sign-in attempts.
@nocobase/plugin-password-policy.Security settings notice no lockout: users can attempt to sign-in in {{ maxSignInAttempts }} times every {{ maxSignInAttemptsInterval }} seconds.
@nocobase/plugin-password-policy.The account has been locked due to too m: The account has been locked due to too many sign-in attempts.
@nocobase/plugin-password-policy.The account has been reached the maximum: The account has been reached the maximum number of sign-in attempts, please try again later.
@nocobase/plugin-password-policy.The user is locked, please try again lat: The user is locked, please try again later.
@nocobase/plugin-password-policy.Your password will expire in {{days}} da: Your password will expire in {{days}} days, please reset your password.

@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Clear executions will not reset executed: Clear executions will not reset executed count, and started executions will not be deleted, are you sure you want to delete them all?
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Data operation nodes in workflow will ru: Data operation nodes in workflow will run in a same transaction until any interruption. Any failure will cause data rollback, and will also rollback the history of the execution.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Delete a main version will cause all oth: Delete a main version will cause all other revisions to be deleted too.

@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Execute workflow asynchronously or synch: Execute workflow asynchronously or synchronously based on trigger type, and could not be changed after created.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Executed workflow cannot be modified. Co: Executed workflow cannot be modified. Could be copied to a new version to modify.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Exit when query result is null: Exit when query result is null
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Fields that are not assigned a value wil: Campos que não recebem valor serão definidos como valor padrão e aqueles sem valor padrão serão definidos como nulo.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.For user actions that require immediate: For user actions that require immediate feedback. Can not use asynchronous nodes in such mode, and it is not recommended to perform time-consuming operations under synchronous mode.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.General failed but should do another try: General failed but should do another try.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.If checked, when there are multiple reco: If checked, when there are multiple records in the query result, an array will be returned as the result, which can be operated on one by one using a loop node. Otherwise, only one record will be returned.

@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Manually canceled whole execution when w: Manually canceled whole execution when waiting.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Node in executed workflow cannot be modi: O nó em fluxo de trabalho executado não pode ser modificado

@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Only triggers when match conditions: Aciona somente quando as condições correspondem
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Only update records matching conditions: Atualizar somente registros que atendem às condições
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Please add at least one condition: Please add at least one condition
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Please select collection first: Por favor, selecione uma coleção primeiro
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Please select the associated fields that: Please select the associated fields that need to be accessed in subsequent nodes. With more than two levels of to-many associations may cause performance issue, please use with caution.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Query records from a collection. You can: Query records from a collection. You can use variables from upstream nodes as query conditions.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Running of some node was aborted by prog: Running of some node was aborted by program flow.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Started and executing, maybe waiting for: Started and executing, maybe waiting for an async callback (manual, delay etc.).

@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Sync enabled status of all workflows fro: Sync enabled status of all workflows from database
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Test run will do the actual data manipul: Test run will do the actual data manipulating or API calling, please use with caution.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.The result of this node has been referen: O resultado deste nó foi referenciado por outros nós ({{nodes}}), por favor, remova a referência antes de excluir.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.The result will be an array containing m: The result will be an array containing matched records, or an empty one if no matching records. This can be used to be processed in a loop node.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.The result will be an object of the firs: The result will be an object of the first matching record only, or null if no matched record.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.The trigger is not configured correctly,: The trigger is not configured correctly, please check the trigger configuration.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.The triggers of same workflow by some no: The triggers of same workflow by some node (create, update and sub-flow etc.) more than this number will be ignored. Large number may cause performance issues. Please use with caution.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.The updated data can trigger other workf: The updated data can trigger other workflows, and the audit log will also be recorded. But it is usually only applicable to several or dozens of pieces of data, otherwise there will be performance problems.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.This node contains branches, deleting wi: Este nó contém ramos, a exclusão também será realizada neles, você tem certeza?
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.This type of trigger has not been suppor: This type of trigger has not been supported to be executed manually.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.This will perform all the actions config: This will perform all the actions configured in the workflow. Are you sure you want to continue?
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Trigger in executed workflow cannot be m: O acionador em fluxo de trabalho executado não pode ser modificado
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Trigger variables need to be filled for: Trigger variables need to be filled for executing.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Triggered according to preset time condi: Triggered according to preset time conditions. Suitable for one-time or periodic tasks, such as sending notifications and cleaning data on a schedule.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Triggered but still waiting in queue to: Triggered but still waiting in queue to execute.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Triggered only if one of the selected fi: Acionado apenas se um dos campos selecionados for alterado. Se não estiver selecionado, será acionado quando qualquer campo for alterado. Quando um registro é adicionado ou excluído, qualquer campo é considerado como tendo sido alterado.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Triggered when data changes in the colle: Triggered when data changes in the collection, such as after adding, updating, or deleting a record. Unlike "Post-action event", Collection event listens for data changes rather than HTTP requests. Unless you understand the exact meaning, it is recommended to use "Post-action event".
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Unassigned fields will be set to default: Unassigned fields will be set to default values, and those without default values will be set to null.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Update all eligible data at one time, wh: Update all eligible data at one time, which has better performance when the amount of data is large. But association fields are not supported (unless foreign key in current collection), and the updated data will not trigger other workflows.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Update records of a collection. You can: Update records of a collection. You can use variables from upstream nodes as query conditions and field values.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Will be executed in the background as a: Will be executed in the background as a queued task.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Workflow executed, the result status is: Workflow executed, the result status is <1>{{statusText}}</1><2>View the execution</2>
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Workflow will be triggered before deleti: Workflow will be triggered before deleting succeeded (only supports pre-action event in local mode).
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Workflow will be triggered directly once: Workflow will be triggered directly once the button clicked, without data saving. Only supports to be bound with "Custom action event".
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Workflow with unknown type will cause er: Workflow with unknown type will cause error. Please delete it or check plugin which provide this type.

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-action-trigger.Event triggers when submitted a workflow: Event triggers when submitted a workflow bound form action.

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-action-trigger.Local mode, triggered after the completi: Local mode, triggered after the completion of actions bound to this workflow
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-action-trigger.The collection to which the triggered da: The collection to which the triggered data belongs.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-action-trigger.Triggered after the completion of a requ: Triggered after the completion of a request initiated through an action button or API, such as after adding or updating data. Suitable for data processing, sending notifications, etc., after actions are completed.
Use a collection to match form data.

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-aggregate.Number of decimal places for query resul: Number of decimal places for query result.

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.Actions from any form block can be bound: Actions from any form block can be bound to this workflow for initiating approvals, and the approval process can be handled and tracked in the approval block of a single record which is typically applicable to business data.

Anyone approve or reject as result.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.Approval action changes unsaved, click \: Approval action changes unsaved, click "Submit" to save.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.Approve when approvals rate greater than: Approve when approvals rate greater than the set percentage, reject when rejections rate greater than or equal to (1 - percentage).
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.Approved if the approval rate is greater: Approved if the approval rate is greater than the set percentage, otherwise rejected.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.Are you sure you want to withdraw it?: Are you sure you want to withdraw it?

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.End the workflow after rejection branch: End the workflow after rejection branch

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.For initiating approvals, or viewing and: For initiating approvals, or viewing and manipulating initiated approvals.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.If checked, the workflow will be termina: If checked, the workflow will be terminated after rejection branch processed.
If it's approved by all, it's approved. If it's rejected by anyone, it's rejected.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.If it's approved by anyone, it's approve: If it's approved by anyone, it's approved. If it's rejected by all, it's rejected.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.In addition to data blocks, a global app: In addition to data blocks, a global approval block can also be used to initiates and processes approvals, which typically applies to administrative data.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.Initiate in both data blocks and global: Initiate in both data blocks and global approval blocks
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.Manual approval operations within the ap: Manual approval operations within the approval process, the approver can approve in the global approval block or in the approval block of a single record.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.Multiple approvers can approve in any or: Multiple approvers can approve in any order.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.Notify applicant when approval is approv: Notify applicant when approval is approved, rejected or returned.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.Send notifications to applicant when app: Send notifications to applicant when approval is done.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.Send notifications to assignees when app: Send notifications to assignees when approval todo is assigned.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.Submission not exists or has been withdr: Submission not exists or has been withdrawn, please try refresh the list.

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.Title of each task item. Default to node: Title of each task item. Default to node title.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.Triggered when an approval request is in: Triggered when an approval request is initiated through an action button or API. Dedicated to the approval process, with exclusive approval node and block for managing documents and tracking processing processes.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.Used to perform manual approval operatio: Used to perform manual approval operations within approval workflow, approvers can perform approval action through the to-do list in the approval block, such as approval, rejection or return.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.Values in the modifiable fields above ma: Values in the modifiable fields above may be different from the original application if changed by other assignees.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.When checked, the workflow will terminat: When checked, the workflow will terminate when the rejection branch ends.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.When rejected or returned, the workflow: When rejected or returned, the workflow will be terminated immediately.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.When select assignees from node result,: When select assignees from node result, only support ID of user (or IDs array of users). Others will not match any user.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.Withdrawable changes unsaved, click \"Su: Withdrawable changes unsaved, click "Submit" to save.

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-custom-action-.Button is not configured properly, pleas: Button is not configured properly, please contact the administrator.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-custom-action-.Could be used on non-record related acti: Could be used on non-record related action buttons. Such as buttons in workbench panel or in table blocks.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-custom-action-.Could only be used on multiple record re: Could only be used on multiple record related action buttons. Such as for batch action in table block. The data in trigger variable will be an array.

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-custom-action-.When the \"Trigger Workflow\" button is: When the "Trigger Workflow" button is clicked, the event is triggered based on different context where the button is located. For complex data processing that cannot be handled simply by built-in operations (CRUD) of NocoBase, you can define a series of operations through a workflow and trigger it with the "Trigger Workflow" button.

When the "Trigger Workflow" button is clicked, the event is triggered based on the single record where the button is located. Suitable for when the data processing is complex and cannot be simply processed by built-in operations (CRUD) of NocoBase, a series of operations can be defined through workflow and triggered through the "Trigger Workflow" button.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-custom-action-.Workflow will be triggered directly once: Workflow will be triggered directly once the button clicked, without data saving. Only supports to be bound with "Custom action event".

Node.js features supported can be found in the documentaion:

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-javascript.The arguments that will be used in scrip: The arguments that will be used in script with same name.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-javascript.The maximum Milliseconds time of the scr: The maximum execution time of the script. 0 means no timeout.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-javascript.The maximum execution time of the script: The maximum execution time of the script. 0 means no timeout.

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-json-query.If the type of query result is object or: If the type of query result is object or array of object, could map the properties which to be accessed in subsequent nodes.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-json-query.Transforming or calculating values from: Transforming or calculating values from complex JSON data.

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-json-variable-.If the JSON object contains array items,: If the JSON object contains array items, parse them. eg: { "arrayKey": [ "item1", "item2" ] will be parsed as "arrayKey", "arrayKey.0", "arrayKey.1", if set to false, only "arrayKey" will be parsed.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-json-variable-.Please update other node references to t: Please update other node references to the key after clicking the parse button.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-json-variable-.Used for mapping any JSON data to struct: Used for mapping any JSON data to structured variables for usage in subsequent nodes.

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-loop.A single number will be treated as a loo: A single number will be treated as a loop count, a single string will be treated as an array of characters, and other non-array values will be converted to arrays. The loop node ends when the loop count is reached, or when the array loop is completed. You can also add condition nodes to the loop to terminate it.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-loop.By using a loop node, you can perform th: By using a loop node, you can perform the same operation on multiple sets of data. The source of these sets can be either multiple records from a query node or multiple associated records of a single record. Loop node can also be used for iterating a certain number of times or for looping through each character in a string. However, excessive looping may cause performance issues, so use with caution.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-loop.When condition is not met on item: When condition is not met on item

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-mailer.Ignore failed sending and continue workf: Ignore failed sending and continue workflow
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-mailer.Send email. You can use the variables in: Send email by calling SMTP service. You can use the variables in the upstream nodes as receivers, subject and content of the email.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-mailer.Subject: Subject

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-manual.Could be used for manually submitting da: Could be used for manually submitting data, and determine whether to continue or exit. Workflow will generate a todo item for assigned user when it reaches a manual node, and continue processing after user submits the form.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-manual.Please check one of your update record f: Please check one of your update record form, and add at least one filter condition in form settings.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-manual.Title of each task item. Default to node: Title of each task item. Default to node title.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-manual.Values preset in this form will override: Values preset in this form will override user submitted ones when continue or reject.

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-notification.Ignore failed sending and continue workf: Ignore failed sending and continue workflow
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-notification.Send email. You can use the variables in: Send email by calling SMTP service. You can use the variables in the upstream nodes as receivers, subject and content of the email.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-notification.Send notification. You can use the varia: Send notification. You can use the variables in the upstream nodes as content and ohter config.

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-parallel.Any succeeded or failed: Qualquer um com sucesso ou falha
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-parallel.Continue after all branches succeeded: Continuar após todos os ramos com sucesso
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-parallel.Continue after any branch succeeded: Continuar após qualquer ramo com sucesso
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-parallel.Continue after any branch succeeded, or: Continuar após qualquer ramo com sucesso ou sair após qualquer ramo falhar
Continue after any branch succeeded, or exit after any branch failed.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-parallel.Run multiple branch processes in paralle: Run multiple branch processes in parallel.

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-request.\"Content-Type\" only support \"applicat: "Content-Type" somente suporta "application/json" e não precisa ser especificado
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-request.Ignore fail request and continue workflo: Ignorar falhas na requisição e continuar o fluxo de trabalho
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-request.Ignore failed request and continue workf: Ignore failed request and continue workflow
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-request.Send HTTP request to a URL. You can use: Send HTTP request to a URL. You can use the variables in the upstream nodes as request headers, parameters and request body.

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-request-interc.Global mode, triggered before executing: Global mode, triggered before executing the following actions
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-request-interc.Local mode, triggered before executing t: Local mode, triggered before executing the actions bound to this workflow
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-request-interc.The following selected requests all trig: The following selected requests all trigger interception on submission
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-request-interc.Triggered before submitting a create, up: Triggered before submitting a create, update, or delete request to a collection, so that data validation, logical judgment, etc., can be performed before executing the request, and then either approving the request or rejecting the request by using the "End process" node.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-request-interc.Triggered before the execution of a requ: Triggered before the execution of a request initiated through an action button or API, such as before adding, updating, or deleting data. Suitable for data validation and logic judgment before action, and the request could be rejected by using the "End process" node.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-request-interc.Triggered only when a form bound to this: Triggered only when a form bound to this workflow is submitted

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-response-messa.Add response message, will be send to cl: Add response message, will be send to client when process of request ends.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-response-messa.If the workflow ends normally, the respo: If the workflow ends normally, the response message will return a success status by default.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-response-messa.If you want to return a failure status,: If you want to return a failure status, please add an "End Process" node downstream to terminate the workflow.

Execute a SQL statement in database.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-sql.Include meta information of this query i: Include meta information of this query in result
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-sql.SQL query result could be used through <: SQL query result could be used through <1>JSON query node</1> (Commercial plugin).
Select a data source to execute SQL.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-sql.Usage of SQL query result is not support: Usage of SQL query result is not supported yet.

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-subflow.Run another workflow and use its output: Run another workflow and use its output as variables.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-subflow.Set output data of this workflow. When t: Set output data of this workflow. When this one is executed as a subflow, the output could be used as variables in downstream nodes of super workflow. If this node is added multiple times, the value of the last executed node prevails.

Set output data of this workflow. When this one is executed as a subflow, the output could be used as variables in downstream nodes of super workflow. If this node is added multiple times, the value of the last node prevails.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-subflow.Synchronous workflow can only call synch: Synchronous workflow can only call synchronous sub-flow.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-subflow.The main workflow in synchronous mode ca: The main workflow in synchronous mode can only select synchronous subflow, while asynchronous mode can select either synchronous or asynchronous subflow.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-subflow.The trigger config of this workflow is i: The trigger config of this workflow is invalid. Please recheck
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-subflow.The trigger of this workflow is not conf: The trigger of this workflow is not configured correctly, and will not be called. Please <1>go to check it</1>.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-subflow.This type of trigger has not been suppor: This type of trigger has not been supported to be called as sub-flow.

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-variable.Assign value to a variable, for later us: Assign value to a variable, for later use.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-variable.Assign value to an existing variable: Assign value to an existing variable

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-webhook.Are you sure to clear below items?: Are you sure to clear below items?
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-webhook.Can only contain numbers, letters, under: Can only contain numbers, letters, underscores, and the first letter should be alphabet.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-webhook.Full URL or search parameters part both: Full URL or search parameters part both supported. For example: "?query1=item1&query2=item2".
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-webhook.Header name support letters, numbers, un: Header names support letters, numbers, underscores “_” or hyphens “-”, and the first letter should be alphabet.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-webhook.Header value support letters, numbers, u: Header value support letters, numbers, underscores “_” or hyphens “-”
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-webhook.If HTTP basic authentication is set, the: If HTTP basic authentication is set, the response status code is 401 if the authentication fails.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-webhook.Name: Name
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-webhook.Please input JSON example from request b: Please input JSON example from request body like { "key1": "item1", "key2": "item2" }
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-webhook.Please set user name and password, and c: Please set user name and password, and callback URL should be
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-webhook.Request data can only be used as variabl: Request data can only be used as variables in subsequent nodes after parsing configured.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-webhook.Synchronized workflows require the addit: Synchronized workflows require the addition of a response node setting. If you do not add a response node, the response status code is set to 200 if the workflow execution succeeds, and 500 if it fails. If the workflow exception does not execute to the response node after the response node is added, the response status code is set to 500.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-webhook.These request data can only be used as v: These request data can only be used as variables in next nodes after the configuration has been parsed.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-webhook.Third-party calls to Webhook URLs trigge: Third-party calls to Webhook URLs trigger process execution. Suitable for third-party systems to initiate notifications, payment callbacks, messages, etc.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-webhook.This URL has been generated to accept th: This URL has been generated to accept the request, which is used to trigger this workflow
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-webhook.Username and password need to be put in: Username and password need to be put in URL like "{{url}}". See: <1>MDN reference</1>.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-webhook.When webhook URL is called, the received: When webhook URL is called, the received parameters set up a structured transformation to be used in subsequent nodes.
